value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-whaaughh!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Sharena!$k$pHhng— Got ya!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Sharena! Are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|A...pit trap? If Princess Reginn hadn't
grabbed me, I'd be skewered by all
the stakes at the bottom.$k$p$EFace_Smile|I owe you! And I won't forget it...
I don't think I can thank you enough!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Another pit trap? What is going
on in these woods?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Well, Eitri, the sage, is also
an inventor.$k$pThe traps were invented to keep
the intruders out. That's what Eitri
told me, anyway.$k$pAnd that's why almost no one from
Niðavellir ever comes here!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|It would have been nice to have
known that earlier...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Huh! The forest may be treacherous,
but look at these beautiful blossoms!
How refreshing... And this one is—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Sharena, wait!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Aahh! One step into the flowers
and enemy forces appeared out
of nowhere!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Right.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ロナン,ch07_13_Ronan_M_Normal,Face|Sorry to make you worry, Mother.
However...I must fight. That is what
I've decided.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Your Majesty, I have returned!
...King Fáfnir?$k$p...Brother?$k$p$EFace_Pain|He's gone... Back on the battlefield,
no doubt. I should follow after him,
and quickly.$k$pWe are the only family each other
has now.$k$p$EFace|Askr's Order of Heroes... Our usual
methods won't be enough to deal
with them. But I won't give up.$k$p$EFace_Anger|If I'm going to get the divine weapon
Járngreipr, the weapon that destroys
gates...that summoner will be key.$k$p$Sbs150|
